name: Serhat Kaya
tagline: What a computational physicist can do?
body:
### Welcome to my personal page
If you are reading this post now, you probably want to have more information about me. It is simple, just move on next section.

### Who am I?
I am currently a senior physics student at Boğaziçi University, Turkey. It may seem that my all interests are about physics, but I can assure you they are not. I am a computer programmer, software developer, web designer, author (yes, definitely I am), movie lover.

### What makes me different?
Indeed, nothing. Since I was a child, I always tried to act like a normal person.

### What am I capable of?
I said I was a developer. As a physicist, I used C, python, and Java. And I also have experience in HTML, CSS, PHP, JavaScript, Photoshop, Corel Draw, Adobe Flash, database with SQL, XML, JSON, and so on. 

Besides these, I am interested designing. By saying designing, I mean any kind of design from web to furniture.

===
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
